title: 404 Issue when trying to access boards profile?
body: The title basically covers my issue. Click on 'Boards Profile' from the menu in the top right corner, takes me straight to a 404. Any reason as to why?

replies.body:
*Bump.  

I am experiencing the same issue and I can replicate it across the most recent versions of Edge, FireFox, and Chrome, [as you can see here](http://tinyurl.com/zxvw8jf)
That's really weird. Can you try a different web browser to see if this persists? If it does, I'd like you to [take a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) and send me a link to it.
